pr_title: fix: Properly clean up state when executing a command fails

timeline.message: fix: Properly clean up state when executing a command fails

timeline.bodyText: We could actually call this before the command is registered right? If something throws between generating the command id and enqueueing?
timeline.author: rodesai

replies.bodyText:
That's true, it is possible.
Ok, now I just log when something is being aborted, but throw no error either way.
replies.author: AlanConfluent
